explains: adj. （身体或精神）脆弱的，易受伤的；（事物、人或地方）易受攻击的，易受伤害的；易患病的；（桥牌）有局方的，有身价的

sentences.en: She was left feeling exposed and vulnerable.
sentences.cn: 她感到自己孤立无助，非常脆弱。

sentences.en: Those most vulnerable to heat stress are the elderly.
sentences.cn: 上了年纪的人最容易因受热而生病。

sentences.en: Their tanks would be vulnerable to attack from the air.
sentences.cn: 他们的坦克将易受空袭。
